attributes.action: giving us back our much needed bus service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The people of Uttoxeter, Staffordshire have been denied access to a reliable bus service.  Many people who live on my street are elderly and/or disabled, and cannot get into town to do shopping or attend doctors and dentists appointments, it now costs us £4 to get into town, and with the bus it would only cost us £1.  So we need our buses back.

rejection.details: Please review the wording of your title.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
